headline: What Edison International (EIX)'s Wildfire Fund and Legal Settlement Mean for Shareholders
summary: Earlier this month, the California Legislature approved Senate Bill 254, establishing a new wildfire claims fund jointly financed by customers and investor-owned utilities, while Southern California Edison, a subsidiary of Edison International, settled the Eaton Fire litigation and sought reimbursement from the Wildfire Insurance Fund. This legislative action and legal settlement directly address wildfire-related financial risks and regulatory uncertainties, offering clearer cost-sharing...
